akn:section.akn:heading: Coordination and development of program with other Federal and non-Federal programs

akn:content.akn:p: § 8145. Coordination and development of program with other Federal and non-Federal programs The Secretary shall coordinate the administration of the provisions of this subchapter in cooperation with other Federal agencies and assure that projects assisted under this subchapter are coordinated with efforts undertaken by State and local public and private entities, including arts organizations. (Pub. L. 95–557, title VIII, § 806, Oct. 31, 1978, 92 Stat. 2124.)
